meanings: be in error by less than one millimeter
be correct[accurate] (to) within less than a millimeter.

vlive.korean: 약간 상상을 뛰어넘는 사차원... 오차원이라고 해야 하나? he shows something of another level. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 호화롭게 기습라이브 시작🐶⭐️
vlive.english: he shows something of another level.

vlive.korean: 한치의 오차도 없이 정박에 그냥 딱! With no errors. Right on the beat! 듣기 View video BRANDNEWBOYS : 커피될게 우유해줘
vlive.english: With no errors. Right on the beat!

vlive.korean: [단 8g의 오차밖에 나지 않은 복싱 팀] 8g! [Team Boxing : Only 8g more] 8g! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! S3 - EP.57
재단을 한 치 오차도 없이! - 재단을. Trimming... With no errors at all! - Trimming... 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : [비투비 예능 훈련소] EP03. 비투비의 8절 스케치북 - 이든(EDEN)
vlive.english: Trimming... With no errors at all! - Trimming...

vlive.korean: 이게 오차(녹차)예요? 오차예요? - 네. [믕지가 좋아하는 녹차 발견!] Is this ocha (green tea)? - Yes. [Eun Ji discovered green tea, which she likes!] 듣기 View video Apink : Apink Diary 2018 EP.08 Apink Fanmeeting in Japan
vlive.english: Is this ocha (green tea)? - Yes. [Eun Ji discovered green tea, which she likes!]

examples.korean: The pilots bombed strategic targets with pinpoint accuracy. 발음듣기 조종사들이 전략적 목표물에 한 치의 오차도 없이 정확히 폭격을 가했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The pilots bombed strategic targets with pinpoint accuracy. 발음

examples.korean: The survey has a margin of error of 2.5%. 발음듣기 그 조사는 오차 범위가 2.5%이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The survey has a margin of error of 2.5%. 발음

examples.korean: The margin of error was plus or minus three percentage points. 발음듣기 오차 범위는 3퍼센트 안팎이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The margin of error was plus or minus three percentage points. 발음

examples.korean: They were working to a tolerance of 0.0001 of a centimetre. 발음듣기 그들은 0.0001 센티미터의 허용 오차에 맞춰 작업을 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were working to a tolerance of 0.0001 of a centimetre. 발음

examples.korean: The kinetic impactor completed its mission without any errors. 발음듣기 운동 충격체는 오차 없이 임무를 완수하였다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The kinetic impactor completed its mission without any errors. 발음
